languages.text: "Я принес{mf||ла} мир на Кьяву Гамма. Покойся, зная, что нечестивцы были наказаны, а ты и твои братья — отомщены".
"I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."
languages.original_text: "Я принес{mf||ла} мир на Кьяву Гамма. Покойся, зная, что нечестивцы были наказаны, а ты и твои братья — отомщены".

traits.locale_text: "I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."
"I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."
"I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."
"I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."

languages.text: «He traído la paz a Kiava Gamma. Puedes descansar sabiendo que los malvados han sido castigados y tus hermanos y tú habéis sido vengados».
languages.original_text: "I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."

traits.locale_text: «He traído la paz a Kiava Gamma. Puedes descansar sabiendo que los malvados han sido castigados y tus hermanos y tú habéis sido vengados».

languages.text: “我已经为基亚瓦伽马星带来了和平。放心吧，邪恶之人已经得到了惩罚，你和你的兄弟们大仇已报。”
languages.original_text: "I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."

traits.locale_text: “我已经为基亚瓦伽马星带来了和平。放心吧，邪恶之人已经得到了惩罚，你和你的兄弟们大仇已报。”

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}がキアヴァ・ガンマに平和を取り戻した。悪は罰せられ、仲間の復讐を果たした。それを胸に休んでほしい」
languages.original_text: "I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}がキアヴァ・ガンマに平和を取り戻した。悪は罰せられ、仲間の復讐を果たした。それを胸に休んでほしい」

languages.text: "Ich habe Kiava Gamma den Frieden gebracht. Wisset, dass die Frevler gerichtet wurden und Ihr und Eure Brüder gerächt wurdet."
languages.original_text: "I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Kiava Gamma den Frieden gebracht. Wisset, dass die Frevler gerichtet wurden und Ihr und Eure Brüder gerächt werden."

languages.text: « J'ai apporté la paix à Kiava Gamma. Reposez en sachant que les malfaisants ont été punis et que vengeance a été assouvie en votre nom, comme en celui de vos frères. »
languages.original_text: "I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai apporté la paix à Kiava Gamma. Reposez en sachant que les malfaisants ont été punis et que vengeance a été assouvie en votre nom, comme en celui de vos frères. »

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'ya sulh getirdim. Suçlular cezalandırıldı, sen ve kardeşlerinin intikamını aldık. Huzur bulasın."
languages.original_text: "I brought peace to Kiava Gamma. Rest in the knowledge that the wicked have been punished, and you and your brethren have been avenged."

traits.locale_text: “Kiava Gama’ya sulh getirdim. Suçlular cezalandırıldı, senin ve kardeşlerinin intikamını aldık. Huzur bulasın.”
